entry.title: ğŸ‰ Welcome to subscribe to App Store Discounts
entry.summary: Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!
entry.content:
Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!

About our RSS feed

  • Focused on delivering App Store app discount information
  • Whenever an app's price drops or in-app purchases go on sale, we will promptly send you a notification
  • Each app's discount information is presented in a separate feed
  • The RSS feed is completely open-source, allowing you to view, contribute, and add your favorite apps at any time

Find Us

App Store Discounts

Finally

If this project has been helpful to you, would you kindly give us a â­ï¸

entry.title: FILCA - Vintage Film Camera
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • UPGRADE PROï¼š$39.99 â†’ $6.99 [$6.99 ~ $39.99]

All Price Information

Priceï¼š$3.99

In-App Purchases

  • UPGRADE PROï¼š$6.99
  • FUJI SERIES FILMï¼š$4.99
  • KODAK SERIES FILMï¼š$5.99
  • WEDDING SERIES FILMï¼š$4.99
  • RETRO SERIES FILMï¼š$4.99
  • IU SERIES FILMï¼š$4.99
  • LOMO SERIESï¼š$4.99
  • UPGRADE PRO VERSIONï¼š$59.99

Application Description

Filca is SLR Film Camera 35 film filters and cinematic effects bring your photos to life. @veteranUser "Without Filca, you're just collecting moments with Filca, you're preserving memories." Master your shots with Filca's expert-level manual controls. â–  Shutter speed, ISO, white balance control in Manual mode â–  35mm film filters from industry leaders like Kodak, Fuji, Agfa Filca is designed to optimize your snapshot experience. It's perfect for taking photos of people, self-portraits, night scenes, and capturing the subtle beauty of everyday life. Apply our filters to achieve an authentic analog film appearance. Main Features: * Auto mode camera with 35mm film filter * Manual mode (Exposure and Focus) * Full control over shutter speed, ISO * Various aspect ratios: 4:3, 3:2, 16:9, 1:1 * Digital zoom up to 8x magnification * Manual Focus Control (macro, landscape) * 35mm film filter from Fuji, Kodak, Agfa (including black and white filter) * Film Grain Effect * Film Date Printing Effect * Optical Image Stabilization * Low Power Mode * Selfie Mode * EXIF Data Storage (including location data) * Portrait Enhancements * Full Resolution Photo * Timer and Flash Function * Grid Mode View Pro Features: * White Balance Adjustment Function * Date Print Function Share your photos on Instagram using #filca We look forward to featuring your work. Follow us on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/filca.app/ Terms of Use: https://han.gl/HCCwV Privacy Policy: https://han.gl/Wclkw Let us elevate your photography journey with Filca.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

entry.title: Cultist Simulator
entry.content:
Discount Informationï¼ˆPriceï¼š$6.99 â†’ $1.99 [$1.99 ~ $6.99]ï¼‰

All Price Information

Priceï¼š$1.99

In-App Purchases

  • Forbidden Bundleï¼š$6.99
  • The Dancerï¼š$1.99
  • The Priestï¼š$1.99
  • The Ghoulï¼š$1.99
  • The Exileï¼š$4.99

Application Description

SEIZE FORBIDDEN TREASURES. SUMMON ALIEN GODS. FEED ON YOUR DISCIPLES. BE WARNED. This game has no tutorial - part of the challenge is figuring out how to play. It's hard, but keep trying, and you'll master it. Good luck! In this infamous roguelike narrative card game, play as a seeker after unholy mysteries in a 1920s-themed setting of hidden gods and secret histories. Become a scholar of the unseen arts. Craft tools and summon spirits. Indoctrinate innocents. Seize your place as the herald of a new age. Cultist Simulator was first released on PC and has more than 200,000 players all over the world. Now weâ€™re bringing the cosmic mysteries of Cultist Simulator to mobile. â€¢ Challenging roguelike gameplay - There is never only one history. Cultist Simulator doesnâ€™t hold your hand. Experiment, expire and transcend death with a story-driven legacy system. Over time youâ€™ll learn enough to wrestle the game to its knees. â€¢ Intense, immersive narrative â€“ Combine cards to tell your own story. A hefty novelâ€™s worth of choice-based storytelling, from the creator of Fallen London and Sunless Sea. There are many paths through this game of ambition, appetite and abomination, and many ways your tale can end. â€¢ A rich Lovecraftian world â€“ Corrupt your friends and consume your enemies. Search your dreams for sanity-twisting rituals. Translate grimoires and glean their lore. Penetrate the realm of the Hours and win a place in their service. Cultist Simulator brings the peripheral horror of Lovecraftâ€™s tales to an entirely new setting. Expand your knowledge with the DLCs: New Legacies, New Ascensions, New Mechanics... â€¢ The Dancer - Join the Bacchanal â€¢ The Priest - Knock, and Ye Shall Be Opened â€¢ The Ghoul - Taste of the graveyard's fruit â€¢ The Exile - Some there are who will not yield If you encounter any issue with the game, please click on â€œContact usâ€ at the bottom of this page and give us as many details as possible regarding the issue and your device: https://playdigious.helpshift.com/hc/en/11-cultist-simulator/?p=ios

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: The Game of Life 2
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • The Ultimate Life Collectionï¼š$34.99 â†’ $19.99 [$19.99 ~ $34.99]

All Price Information

Priceï¼š$4.99

In-App Purchases

  • The Ultimate Life Collectionï¼š$19.99
  • Mothgirl Outfitï¼š$0.99
  • Tunneler Shipï¼š$0.99
  • Foxman Bikeï¼š$0.99
  • Action Car Avatarï¼š$0.99
  • Super Pet Avatarï¼š$0.99
  • Magical Girl Outfitï¼š$0.99
  • Skyscraper Avatarï¼š$0.99
  • Foxman Outfitï¼š$0.99
  • Super Hero World Bundleï¼š$7.99

Application Description

Live 1000 lives in the official sequel to the classic family board game, The Game of Life! Will you be a Video Blogger or an Astronomer? Play now! Voted "Best Digital Board Gameâ€ in the Pocket Gamer Awards 2021 Played by over 50 Million Families Worldwide Customise your peg, hop in your eco car and race your friends and family through The Game of Life 2! Itâ€™s a contemporary sequel to the classic family favourite board game, The Game of Life. With an added crossroad moment and new ways to win, what will you choose? Earn points for Knowledge and Happiness as well as Wealth. Go to College, or donâ€™t. Get married early, save it for later, or stay single! Have kids, adopt pets, do both or neither. The choices are all yours, and every decision counts! Features The Game of Life 2 digital board game is the award-winning sequel to the original Hasbro board game, The Game of Life. â€¢ A GAME FOR UP 4 PLAYERS - Join 3 of your favourite people and live your dreams â€¢ *NEW* VIDEO CHAT AND PLAY - Live every life face-to-face with in-game video chat â€¢ AN AD-FREE GAME - Enjoy the complete game with no interruptions â€¢ 6 TRANSLATIONS - English, French, Spanish, German, Italian and Brazilian Portuguese â€¢ SINGLE PLAYER - Take on our challenging AI â€¢ ONLINE MULTIPLAYER - Connect with fans, or invite friends and family to a private game â€¢ PASS & PLAY - No internet? No problem! Pass a single device between players for a wifi-free experience How to play CUSTOMISE your character Customise your pink, blue or newly available purple peg with a style all of your own. SPIN THE SPINNER The game starts with a big decision. Will you go to College or straight into work? In this classic simulation, what will your friends and family choose? Itâ€™s your LIFE PATH Get married or donâ€™t, have kids, adopt pets, or both! Work as a Pet Groomer, then qualify and become a Wind Turbine Technician! The choices are yours! More WAYS TO WIN Earn points for every choice you make! Every choice increases your wealth, happiness or knowledge, so every decision is valid. RETIRE your way Continue living the life of your dreams! Relax in a luxury home, or hit the road and fulfil your bucket list! Unlike the classic board game, you can choose to venture on! Earn REWARDS to UNLOCK new items Unlock new pegs, outfits and vehicles by playing the game and earning rewards! In-game Video Chat Recreate the magic! Gather around the board with in-game video chat in Online Multiplayer Mode. Itâ€™s super easy to set-up and play: â€¢ Create your free private account â€¢ Invite your friends and family to chat groups â€¢ Start games straight from those chats â€¢ Play face-to-face wherever you are Itâ€™s simple, seamless fun for everyone. The Ultimate Life Collection Venture into a collection of 10 amazing fantasy worlds. Live life in enchanted worlds, make friends with dinosaurs in the Age of Giants and launch into the futuristic Lunar Age! Every new world features new Outfits, Vehicles, Jobs, Properties and more!

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

The Secret Elevator Remastered â€” an atmospheric adventure with first-person horror elements. Take on the role of a person trapped inside their dream. This place is filled with a mix of memories and nightmares. To get out, you have to open a small door. Immerse yourself in the game's history, walk through many endings, and discover the key secret.

entry.title: AeroPads - Pads & Soundscapes
entry.content:
Discount Informationï¼ˆPriceï¼š$5.99 â†’ $2.99 [$2.99 ~ $5.99]ï¼‰

All Price Information

Priceï¼š$2.99

In-App Purchases

  • Orbit Packï¼š$4.99

Application Description

Have you ever struggled to find confidence on stage or inspiration in the studio? AeroPads cues immersive pads and soundscapes that inspire and equip you to perform and write your best. ENHANCE YOUR SOUND. ENGAGE YOUR AUDIENCE. Every musician has experienced an empty mix or an awkward transition. When using AeroPads, you instantly add more dimension and character to your sound. With a more immersive mix and the ability to perform smooth and seamless transitions, you will feel more confident while your audience will be more engaged. FOR EVERY MUSICIAN. Pads and soundscapes are a versatile accompaniment to nearly any style of music. Whether you are a soloist or full band, AeroPads will take your sound to the next level. Rock bands, worship teams, wedding singers, producers, songwriters, and instrumentalists are just a few of the many types of musicians that have loved using AeroPads. DESIGNED FOR THE STAGE. INSPIRED BY SPACE. AeroPads features creative and immersive soundscapes paired with a beautiful and intuitive interface, all inspired by the pinnacle of exploration and inspiration: outer space. CREATIVITY THAT SPARKS CREATIVITY. AeroPads aren't your typical pads. Most pads out there are really boring or insanely obnoxious. However, AeroPads features thoughtfully crafted soundscapes that are meticulously fine-tuned with the perfect amount of harmonic and textural movement. Simply put, AeroPads won't step on the toes of your arrangement or get on the nerves of your sound guy (like most other pads out there). Highlighted Features: - A beautiful space-inspired interface with a simple and intuitive design. - Live View: Every key and three of your favorite patches are instantly accessible (best suited for experimentation, free-flowing sets, and songwriting). - Setlist View: Plan and build a detailed setlist (best suited for structured sets and seamless transitions). - The iconic Atmosphere Soundpack which includes five unique patches named after and inspired by the layers of Earth's atmosphere. - Three patches can be added to Live View to be made instantly accessible, so there's no need to dig through menus to just to change a patch when performing live. - Additional patches and Soundpacks available for purchase. - Key-specific pads in multiple tonalities: major, minor, and neutral. - Concert pitch adjustment. How to Use: 01. Cue a pad that matches the key of your musical arrangement. 02. Play overtop of the accompanying pads and soundcapes. 03. Enjoy the boost of audience engagement, musician confidence, and creative inspiration. Pads and soundscapes are intended as a subtle accompaniment to musical arrangements/performances. They are designed to be cued according to the key of the arrangement. Once cued, you'll hear a droning pad centered around the root note with additional harmonic textures within the selected key. The only time a pad's key should change within a song is in the instance of a key change. For best results, mix AeroPads appropriately within the overall mix. When mixed too loud, AeroPads may compete with melodies and the arrangement. When mixed too quietly, AeroPads may be less effective. When mixed appropriately, they will sound awesome.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

entry.title: Deco: Wallpaper Creator
entry.content:
Discount Informationï¼ˆPriceï¼š$2.99 â†’ $0.99 [$0.99 ~ $2.99]ï¼‰

All Price Information

Priceï¼š$0.99

Application Description

Deco: Wallpaper Your Way. Stop searching, start creating. Download Deco and design the wallpaper only you can imagine. Tired of boring backgrounds? Unleash your creativity with Deco and design stunning, unique wallpapers for your iPhone Lock Screen and Home Screen! Go way beyond the defaults and make your device truly yours. Create Your Vibe: Photos: Bring your memories to life! Use your own photos as backgrounds â€“ Deco can even intelligently separate the subject* so your stickers tuck neatly behind (or in front of) it. Gradients: Blend gorgeous, smooth color transitions with an easy-to-use editor and inspiring presets. Perfect for subtle or vibrant looks. Stripes: Design chic and custom stripe patterns. You control the colors, angle, spacing, and background for endless possibilities. Presets help you get started fast. Color: Sometimes simple is best. Pick the exact solid color that matches your mood or theme. Image Playground: Feeling adventurous? Generate completely unique scenes using the magic of AI directly within Deco*. Add Your Personal Touch: Stickers: Layer on the fun! Add text, your favorite emoji, unique stickers (including Genmoji*). Place them anywhere you like â€“ they'll look great even on different screen sizes! Simple, Powerful, Yours: Deco makes advanced customization easy and fun for everyone. It combines powerful features with a beautiful, intuitive interface. Deco won in the Swift Student Challenge 2025. (Subject Separation, Image Playground, and Genmoji require compatible devices and iOS versions supporting these Apple Intelligence features.) (iPadOS support and optional iCloud Sync planned for future updates.) Privacy Policy: https://docs.aethers.world/deco/privacypolicy Terms of Use: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

  • Golden Passï¼š$1.99

  • 50 Ticketsï¼š$1.99
  • 500 Ticketsï¼š$9.99

Application Description

Tank Battle is very popular TV game since 8-bit console present. From 2012, we develop "Super Tank Battle" and provide 500 maps to player. Many people play it day by day. Now we using a new game engine to offer new game "Infinity Tank Battle". Infinity Tank Battle is a brand new tank battle game. It is following various classic essential features, and add some new interesting elements. Core Game Rule: - Defence your base - Destroy all enemy tanks Key Features: - Different type of enemy - Different type of Map style - Special items - Auto Helper tank - Import Super Tank Battle 500 Legend maps Infinity Tank Battle will continue update, our target is over 1000 map. And this game is cross-platform, you can find it on mobile, PC, and Mac.

entry.title: Calorie Counter PRO MyNetDiary
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • MyNetDiary Premiumï¼š$69.99 â†’ $8.99 [$8.99 ~ $69.99]

All Price Information

Priceï¼š$3.99

In-App Purchases

  • MyNetDiary Premiumï¼š$8.99

Application Description

Track calories, food, and macros with ease! MyNetDiary has a free barcode scanner, personal diet plans, and AI Meal Scan for instant logging â€” all in a smart, simple-to-use app. USERS SAYâ€¦ The best Love this app! The best out of many food tracking apps that I have tried over the years. Love that it is free! The breakdown of the meal and daily nutrition is very informative. Try it you will love it! LOVE LOVE LOVE THIS APP Best app for tracking food, exercise! Consistently losing weight! I love how it shows you if you're on target for your goal. Great layout, great look, easy to use!!! I highly recommend this app if you're looking to be a healthier you!!! Fast, intuitive, user friendly I have tried other calorie tracking programs over the years and this app is by far the best I've come across. I highly recommend it. The free version is very good and I am now enjoying the extra functions through a paid subscription. RECOGNIZED EXCELLENCE â€¢ Ranked #1 in Forbes Healthâ€™s Best Weight Loss Apps of 2025. â€¢ Rated #1 by the American Journal of Preventive Medicine. â€¢ Praised by The New York Times as â€œsimpler, quicker, and better-lookingâ€ than other apps. â€¢ Featured in Todayâ€™s Dietitian, alongside WW and Noom. DIFFERENT FROM OTHER DIET APPS â€¢ Simple & Generous Features: Packed with free tools, no ads. â€¢ Lightning-Fast Logging: Barcode scanner and AI Meal Scan make tracking effortless. â€¢ Verified Food Database: Over 1.7 million items with 108 nutrients for accuracy. â€¢ Privacy Focused: No account required. MyNetDiary puts you in control. You can pick a diet or a meal plan, follow our registered dietitians' easy tips, and follow the app's guidance. Or, you can turn them off and simply use MyNetDiary as the best free calorie-counting app in the world. PROVEN SUCCESS â€¢ Active members lose an average of 1.4 lbs/week â€¢ Over 25 million users have chosen MyNetDiary, many switched from other diet apps A few of the free version features: â€¢ Easy food, exercise, and water tracking. â€¢ Daily coaching tips and meal reminders. â€¢ Customizable dashboard for your goals. â€¢ iOS Health integration and Apple Watch support. â€¢ Shopping lists, nutrition articles, and how-to videos. SPECIAL PRO APP FEATURES â€¢ Up to 108 nutrients tracked â€¢ Plan macros â€¢ Full set of charts â€¢ Timestamps â€¢ Carb tracking If you need more support, MyNetDiary Premium provides all the guidance and features you may need. At your fingertips, you'll find: â€¢ Premium Diets, 600+ full-flavored Premium Recipes and Menus by RDs, including low-carb, keto, high-protein, Mediterranean, vegetarian, and more - with diet planners, guides, and feedback. â€¢ Intermittent fasting - full-featured, with fasting timer and different protocols. â€¢ Macros planning and cycling. â€¢ Planning and tracking up to 108 nutrients, including omegas and aminos. â€¢ Recipe import tool - easily load internet recipes and calculate complete nutrition. â€¢ Integrations with top fitness trackers - Fitbit, Garmin, and Withings. â€¢ In-depth reporting and analysis tools to improve your diet. Subscription Terms: The subscription period will automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current subscription period. To turn this function off, turn off auto-renew in your iTunes account. Renewal payments will differ depending on subscription and pricing at the time of renewal. Your iTunes account will be charged when the purchase is confirmed. Privacy Policy: www.mynetdiary.com/privacy.html Terms of Use: www.mynetdiary.com/terms.html
